@context.title: The JSON-LD Context for this document

@type.title: JSON-LD identifier for the document type
@type.description: This field is used to define the type of the document, and in this case should always be 'Temporary'.  MUST be present.

received.title: The list of integers identifying the segments that have been successfully uploaded so far.
received.description: MUST be present if one or more segments have been uploaded

items.title: The segments that have been uploaded

expecting.title: This list of integers identifying the segments which are expected and that have not yet been deposited
expecting.description: MUST be present if there are any segments remaining to be uploaded

assembledSize.title: The expected size in bytes of the final resulting assembled file.

segmentSize.title: The expected size in bytes of the segments (except the final one) that will be uploaded.
